title: Handling bitmap scale in FontLab
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know if there is a way to control how FontLab decides the size of bitmaps pasted in the background? When I paste my capital letters from Photoshop, the bitmaps are automatically scaled to the caps height. This is fine with 'A' and 'H', but not with 'C' and 'O' which I want slightly taller than the caps height. And when I do the same with 'Å', the bitmap is suddenly enormous.

I would simply want them all to be pasted to the same scale. Is that even possible?

/Måns
author: Mans
